game.name: Watercraft Rush
game.description:
Summer is just coming and many people have already planned to go and enjoy in the water place! We have got you covered with a brand new racing game where you have to participate in a popular watercraft race competition. Join Watercraft Rush and be prepared to drive your yacht along the track and helps it reach to the goal before the timer expires! Make sure not to ride outside the track and crash on the float otherwise your speed will slow down.

Start the engine your yacht and race it through three different worlds in this HTML5 retro driving game! Wow! There will be three different tracks of increasing your difficulty and making the gameplay quite interesting and challenging. Make sure to avoid all the obstacles along the way and finish all the laps before the time runs out. Speed your way across the sea and get ready to hop on to a top of the range in this action-packed jet ski racing game!

Put your driving abilities to the test to race across amazing blue waters in the baking sun and jump on a lovely Jet Ski and glide across the sea at death-defying speeds! We are pretty sure that you are sufficient enough to achieve the highest speeds and challenge your opponents in a way like never before. With 3 different tracks to play, high-quality graphics, and seamless gameplay, this best racing game can keep you entertained for hours. Good luck to play some more popular titles from the category of free race games and have a blast online, no download required!
